name: Critical Exposure
description: Critical Exposure: The reactor has a problem, its going to meltdown if we don't stop it. We have a team of volunteers who are trying to reach the control room to enable reactor shutdown. The problem? Radiation levels are so far past safe levels, its basically a one way ticket. Reach the controls, save the reactor, and try and do it with the smallest loss of human life! Created for the GameParade Spring Jam 2022 Made with Unity
